query: WITH entities AS (SELECT * FROM core_interest_accrual_cycles WHERE (credit_facility_id = ANY($1))) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: InterestAccrualCycleId", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $2 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_interest_accrual_cycle_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY e.id, e.sequence
